participant_1.name: Jack
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and cautious, Jack values his sobriety and avoids substances.
participant_1.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, Luna often feels isolated despite her powers.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

content.text: Hey! Are you a recovering alcoholic? Because I am.
I have a lot of drugs.
I have never been to the city.
